# JSONDecoder.DateDecodingStrategy.formatted(_:)

**Case**

The strategy that defers formatting settings to a supplied date formatter.

## Declaration

```swift
case formatted(DateFormatter)
```

## Custom Formats

- **JSONDecoder.DateDecodingStrategy.custom(_:)**: The strategy that formats custom dates by calling a user-defined function.
